Posts.EditableText: I wrote a text adventure.   Added pages.  Hyperlinked them.  Done.  Easy.  Now I try to create a new game and it only lists rooms and objects and such.  What am I doing wrong?
Posts.HTML: I wrote a text adventure. Added pages. Hyperlinked them. Done. Easy. Now I try to create a new game and it only lists rooms and objects and such. What am I doing wrong?

Posts.EditableText: Sounds like your first one was a Gamebook and the latest one is a Text Adventure. Check what you are choosing when you make a new one.
Posts.HTML: Sounds like your first one was a Gamebook and the latest one is a Text Adventure. Check what you are choosing when you make a new one.
